Description: Innophos agreed to pay $1,398,000 civil penalties, split equally between the EPA and the State of Louisiana, in settlement of allegations it sent hazardous waste to an unsuitable facility for disposal.

Agency: New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on October 26, 2020 in response to an open records request. The data was a spreadsheet version of information contained in the records in the DEP DataMiner at https://www13.state.nj.us/DataMiner
